title: June 2016 OCCC
body:
Hi all, sorry it's late, but here is the entry post for the June 2016 OCCC.
For those of you who don't know the rules, they are as follows.
The OCCC (Oceania Champion Concept Contest) for each month will be open from the first of the month, to the 27th, with winners being announced on the 2nd of the following month. Each entry must have detailed tooltips for abilities, base stats, growth stats, and a proposed gameplay outline. A backstory may be included if the author wishes, though it will hold no sway in the judging process. Entries must be entirely the author's own work, though can be submitted on behalf of another person, with appropriate credit being given along with the link. To enter, post a link to the boards post containing your entry in the comments below.
All right, let's get this month of OCCC underway!

Current Entries:

replies.body: Welp, that sucks. No entries for June. :(
